doc:
Happy Humphrey https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Happy_Humphrey 0 William Joseph Cobb (July 16, 1926 – March 14, 1989), best known by his ring and screen names of Happy Humphrey, Happy Farmer Humphrey, and "Squasher" Humphrey, was an American professional wrestler and the heaviest professional wrestler of all time. His most active period was in the 1950s and 1960s when he billed himself as "the world's largest wrestler". Humphrey averaged 750 lb (340 kg) during his career. Several times, he weighed in at over 800 lb (360 kg), and on one occasion he weighed over 900 lb (410 kg) William_Joseph_Cobb ( July_16_,_1926 – March_14_,_1989 ) , best_known by his_ring_and_screen_names of Happy_Humphrey , Happy_Farmer_Humphrey , and " Squasher_"_Humphrey , was an_American_professional_wrestler and the_heaviest_professional_wrestler of all_time . His_most_active_period was in the_1950s_and_1960s when he billed himself as " the_world 's_largest_wrestler_" . Humphrey averaged 750_lb_(_340_kg_) during his_career .
